Please refer to [Affiliate Disclosure](/affiliate-disclosure/). DeFi Kingdoms Crystal news About DeFi Kingdoms DeFi Kingdoms? [DeFi Kingdoms](https://defikingdoms.com/) is a browser-based blockchain game combining several [DeFi](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/glossary/defi) elements in an intriguing and compelling way. Its gameplay elements merge together a [DEX](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/glossary/decentralized-exchange-dex), an [NFT](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/glossary/non-fungible-token) marketplace, and [liquidity pool](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/glossary/liquidity-pool) opportunities all under an umbrella of fantasy pixel art, giving the game its trademark combination of DeFi and retro game design. In this fashion, the team behind DeFi Kingdoms wants to "embrace the full potential of the blockchain in game form" and create synergies between gaming and decentralized finance. CRYSTAL is the [utility ("power") token](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/glossary/utility-token) of the DeFi Kingdoms: Crystalvale
